name: Cruddur
description: a sorta twitter clone(obviously can't build twitter on t2 micros) with focus on seamless communication and unparalleled reach, cruddur combines the power of messaging, a global content distribution network, top-notch security, and the reliability of AWS infrastructure.

name: Magento
description: here I deployed Magento, an e-commerce solution on bare metal EC2 instances with an autoscaling rule based on CPU usage metrics.

name: WildRyde
description: wildryde is a very simple horse ride booking app that combines the power of arcGIS map and serverless technology built on a serverless infrastructure eliminating the hassle of managing infrastructure. it's still in the works.

name: Kubernetes NGINX
description: setting up a kubernetes cluster is easy most especially with cloud services. setting up HPA on the other hand comes with complexities. This is a kubernetes cluster setup with 3 nodes and a pod running NGINX. The (Elastic, Logstash, Kibana)ELK stack was also setup to monitor the cluster and get insights on the health of the application running within the cluster.
